name: Dangerkids
description:
'''Dangerkids''' (stylised as '''DangerKids''' or '''dangerkids''') is an American [[metalcore]] band formed in [[Dayton, Ohio|Dayton]], [[Ohio]], in 2012. The band's line-up consists of dual vocalists Andy Bane and Tyler Smyth, guitarist Alex Asch, bassist Jake Bonham and drummer Katie Cole.

The band's debut album, ''Collapse'', was released on [[Rise Records]] in 2012. Dangerkids moved to Paid Vacation Records for their sophomore release, ''blacklist_'', released in 2017. In November 2020, Tyler Smyth revealed the band were working on their third album.
